name: performance-k6
description: Modular k6 performance test template (Load, Spike, Stress)

scripts.test:load: cross-env ENV=dev LOG_LEVEL=info k6 run src/tests/load.test.js
scripts.test:spike: cross-env ENV=dev LOG_LEVEL=info k6 run src/tests/spike.test.js
scripts.test:stress: cross-env ENV=dev LOG_LEVEL=info k6 run src/tests/stress.test.js
scripts.test:load:smoke: cross-env ENV=dev LOG_LEVEL=info SMOKE=1 k6 run src/tests/load.test.js
scripts.test:spike:smoke: cross-env ENV=dev LOG_LEVEL=info SMOKE=1 k6 run src/tests/spike.test.js
scripts.test:stress:smoke: cross-env ENV=dev LOG_LEVEL=info SMOKE=1 k6 run src/tests/stress.test.js
scripts.test:load:staging: cross-env ENV=staging LOG_LEVEL=info k6 run src/tests/load.test.js
scripts.test:spike:staging: cross-env ENV=staging LOG_LEVEL=info k6 run src/tests/spike.test.js
scripts.test:stress:staging: cross-env ENV=staging LOG_LEVEL=info k6 run src/tests/stress.test.js
scripts.test:load:prod: cross-env ENV=prod LOG_LEVEL=warn k6 run src/tests/load.test.js
